heading: Avighna
summary: A flower collection drive from 30+ Ganpati Pandals across the city of mumbai.
description: desc - Over the last three years, we have worked tirelessly to ideate, implement, reflect, and re-ideate to host projects which lie at the heart of our mission - to combine purpose with fun. All our projects, regardless of what work they require, include an educational component to ensure people are aware of the simple steps they can take to make a difference. Our projects include a broad range of activities, all targetted towards some or the other facet concerning the environment or animals.
